name: etsy_search
description: Search for products on Etsy. Returns up to 15 results with title, price, rating, review count, shop name, image, and URL.

steps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('[data-search-results] li .v2-listing-card, .wt-grid .v2-listing-card, [class*="listing-card"][data-listing-id], .search-listings-group .v2-listing-card'); if (items.length === 0) { const altItems = document.querySelectorAll('[data-search-results] li, .search-listings-group li'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(altItems.length, 15); i++) { const el = altItems[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('h3, [class*="title"], .v2-listing-card__info a'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('[class*="price"] span.currency-value, .wt-text-title-01 .currency-value, span[class*="price"]'); const currencyEl = el.querySelector('[class*="price"] span.currency-symbol, .currency-symbol'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/listing/"]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img[src*="etsystatic"], img[src*="etsy"], img'); const ratingEl = el.querySelector('[class*="rating"] span, .wt-screen-reader-only'); const shopEl = el.querySelector('[class*="shop-name"], .v2-listing-card__shop a, p[class*="shop"]'); const reviewCountEl = el.querySelector('[class*="review"] span, [class*="rating"] + span'); const freeShippingEl = el.querySelector('[class*="free-shipping"], [class*="freeShipping"]'); if (titleEl || linkEl) { results.push({ title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', price: (currencyEl ? currencyEl.textContent.trim() : '') + (priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : ''), url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '', rating: ratingEl ? ratingEl.textContent.trim() : '', review_count: reviewCountEl ? reviewCountEl.textContent.trim() : '', shop_name: shopEl ? shopEl.textContent.trim() : '', free_shipping: !!freeShippingEl }); } } } else { for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 15); i++) { const el = items[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('h3, [class*="title"], .v2-listing-card__info a'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('[class*="price"] span.currency-value, .wt-text-title-01 .currency-value, span[class*="price"]'); const currencyEl = el.querySelector('[class*="price"] span.currency-symbol, .currency-symbol'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/listing/"]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img[src*="etsystatic"], img[src*="etsy"], img'); const ratingEl = el.querySelector('[class*="rating"] span, .wt-screen-reader-only'); const shopEl = el.querySelector('[class*="shop-name"], .v2-listing-card__shop a, p[class*="shop"]'); const reviewCountEl = el.querySelector('[class*="review"] span, [class*="rating"] + span'); const freeShippingEl = el.querySelector('[class*="free-shipping"], [class*="freeShipping"]'); results.push({ title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', price: (currencyEl ? currencyEl.textContent.trim() : '') + (priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : ''), url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '', rating: ratingEl ? ratingEl.textContent.trim() : '', review_count: reviewCountEl ? reviewCountEl.textContent.trim() : '', shop_name: shopEl ? shopEl.textContent.trim() : '', free_shipping: !!freeShippingEl }); } } return { query: `{{query}}`, result_count: results.length, results: results }
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract product results
